mosinstall.name: Link - ArtForms Recived Forms in FrontEnd
mosinstall.author: InterJoomla
mosinstall.description: Make a link of recived forms of ArtForms in FrontEnd

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A little imagen will be showed into left or right place o menu article, images must be into folder images/stories/

param.name: unique_itemid
param.label: Unique ID
param.description: Use article's Id for this link
